questions.description: Noun.  A noun is a word used to identify the name of a person, place, animal or thing. As an example, in Adele is an award-winning artist. Here, the noun is Adele, which is the name of a person.
questions.question: If that the case, What is the noun in, I live in Amsterdam.

fallbacks.question: What is the noun in, I visited the Eiffel Tower in Paris.
fallbacks.clue: there is more than one noune here. One is paris

fallbacks.question: What is the noun in, Summer is very hot.

questions.description: Pronoun. A pronoun is a word used in the place of a noun in any sentence. These are used to avoid the repetitive usage of a noun in a sentence. As an example, in the sentence, Roger runs very fast. And Roger has won several competitions. We can say he has won several competitions rather than using roger again
questions.question: Now, can you identify the pronoun in, Would you like to have coffee?.
questions.clue: Remember, noun can be subtituted by pronoun.

fallbacks.question: What is the pronoun in, Everyone is sleeping in the dorm room?.
fallbacks.clue: look for something similar to a noun.

fallbacks.question: What is the pronoun in, This house is mine?.

questions.description: Verb.  The verb describes an action, occurrence or happening of an act. Let's take the sentense, Adam is singing. Here, singing is the verb, which denotes an act of doing something.
questions.question: By that, Can you identify the verb in the following sentence?. The monkey jumpped to the window.

fallbacks.question: What is the verb in, Jack left in a hurry.
What is the verb in, Michelle hurt her elbow while playing.
fallbacks.clue: There are two verbs here, one is playing.

questions.description: Adverbs.  An adverb is a word that revises a verb, adjective, clause, phrase, preposition, or a sentence. in, She is usually late to the class, usually is the adverb which is modifying the verb in the sentence.
questions.question: Now, can you identify the Adverb in the following sentence?. Marcus always arrives early.
questions.clue: Here the verb is arrives. adverb is the thing that modifies verb

fallbacks.question: What is the adverb in, Their pets go everywhere together.
What is the adverb in, The soccer team almost quit.
fallbacks.clue: The word that describes the verb quit.
